body: A dual-cursed oracle must choose two curses at 1st level. One of these curses (oracle's choice) never changes its abilities as the oracle gains levels; for example, an oracle with clouded vision never gains darkvision 60 feet, blindsense, or blindsight. The other curse comes with its normal benefits.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Oracle/Oracle Archetypes/Dual-Cursed Oracle/Oracles Curse
name: Oracle's Curse
